long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Online Tab browser extension is the latest browser extension that works towards making your browsing more meaningful and efficient. It lets you create notes while you’re performing a task and helps you remember the important key points that you might miss without keeping them in writing. 

Task Online Tab extension sets your Chrome browser’s default search engine to Bing and overrides the New Tab layout for a better online experience.

Download the “Task Online Tab” extension on your Chrome browser to get to keep your important findings secure at one place that you can easily access whenever you need them.

What makes Task Online Tab a useful browser extension?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Task Online Tab is one of the rarest browser extensions offering an innovative way that users can apply to their routine online practices. The extension focuses on liberating users to write down important key-notes, which they might forget the other moment. Task Online Tab has been designed and developed after a rigorous study of human psychology and behavior as well as required technology that has now been shaped into a useful piece of product, that too for FREE.

Features
----------------
- Make to-do notes on the go and never forget anything.
- Absolutely FREE browser extension.
- Easy-to-use interface for every user-group.
- Sets Bing as your default search engine to provide proficient and relevant search results.
- Features a customizable new tab layout for enhanced user experience.

How to use Task Online Tab extension?
----------------------------------------------------------------
Upon successful installation of Task Online Tab on Chrome, click the extension icon at the top right corner to enable the extension.

If you have any queries, suggestions, or feedback, please contact us and help us improve our services for you.

Upon clicking the 'Add to Chrome' button, you confirm your agreement to install this Chrome™ extension and abide by the EULA & Privacy Policy.
